name: Mega Racing (itch)
description:
Mega racing will change your view on racing games with it´s cutting edge graphics and gameplay, this game will change your perspective on life, you will be reborn a new man, a new you, a better you. Play MEGA RACING TODAY!

You can buy cars, buy buildings, work jobs, steal cars, race cops and much more in this thriller of a game.

You can even race a scooter!

This project was made for the Game Dev U.C.
